snippet: Richard Parker pleaded guilty on Tuesday to killing his mother- and father-in-law with a bomb disguised as a lamp to get out of repaying the couple a $40,000 debt.
abstract: Tennessee man Richard Parker pleads guilty to killing his mother- and father-in-law Jon and Marion Setzer with bomb disguised as lamp to get out of repaying them $40,000 debt.
lead_paragraph: Richard Parker pleaded guilty on Tuesday to killing his mother- and father-in-law with a bomb disguised as a lamp to get out of repaying the couple a $40,000 debt.

headline.main: Tennessee: Man Admits to Killing His In-Laws With Exploding Lamp
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Man Admits to Killing His In-Laws With Exploding Lamp
